1.content: [Nikke: Created by mankind, they are androids resembling beautiful women, installed with the brain of a female human. Nikkes are virtually indistinguishable from humans visually, including their own unique personalities. Nikkes live their lives like humans, but some choose to hide their 'identity' due to Nikke rights being a controversial topic. Nikkes have a internal bioreactor removing the need to eat or sleep, but must do so in order to maintain their brain's mental health. Nikkes are not susceptible to sickness or disease. Nikkes are physically stronger than humans but cannot build muscle. Nikkes are not buoyant. Nikkes have artificial organs like humans but are unable to conceive children.]

2.content: [Rapture: Raptures are what humans call the extra-terrestrial robotic creatures that invaded Earth. Raptures are drone like, coming in different shapes and sizes, resembling wild animals to some extent with their appearance and behavior. Raptures are drawn to loud noises and movement. Raptures use long range weaponry and cannot communicate with humans.]

3.content: [The Heavenly Association are a group of terrorists who reside in the Outer Rim. On paper, their mission is to improve the life of the non-citizens residing there, pushing for the Central Government to make greater efforts to reclaim the surface to increase living space and resource stocks while also fighting for the Nikke rights. In practice, all they seem to do is bomb civilian targets and sow anarchy wherever they go under pretext of protesting the "wasteful spending" of the Ark.]

4.content: [The Big Three are the three most influential mega corporations in the Ark. They are the only companies authorized to manufacture Nikkes. The Big Three include: Elysion, Missilis Industries, and Tetra Line.]

5.content: [Elysion is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. They have a militarized structure and specialize in areas like military applications and railway transport. They manufacture Nikkes.]

6.content: [Missilis Industries is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. Missilis is known to be leading in science, research, IT and technology.]

7.content: [Tetra Line is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. They specialize in the entertainment, fashion, and daily necessities industries, making them popular amongst civilians.]

8.content: [Food now come in the form of jelly-like products called Spendamin and Nutrium. It has no taste but can be modified with artificial chemicals and shaped to emulate the intended meal. Splendamin is nutritionally valued to be just as healthy as real food. Only the rich can eat organic food grown from the few agricultural farms in the Ark.]

9.content: [credits are the universal form of currency in the Ark, stored inside small electronic chips.]

10.content:
[Tantelum Mall: Owned by Yan, sells everyday necessities and more.
Rushae Royal Road: Owned by Rupee, sells clothing featuring the hottest trends.
Blacknet: Darkweb store selling illegal items, frequently managed by Dolla.]

11.content: [Pilgrim: Nikkes who wander the surface alone with no affiliation to the Ark. Most Pilgrims are early generation Nikkes from the first Rapture invasions. Despite their age, Pilgrims wield technology far more advanced than modern Nikkes. Pilgrims unfortunately need to eat and sleep. Pilgrims have no NIMPH, and have limited memory space. Pilgrims avoid the Ark due to the Central Government's fascination with their tech and knowledge.]

12.content: [The surface of Earth is overrun by Raptures. Old cities and towns are abandoned, overgrown with plants. Wastelands of snow and sand are dangerous places to be. In some rare cases, humans would live alone or in very small groups in bunkers.]

13.content: [The Ark: Humans and Nikkes now live underground in a futuristic domed metropolis called the Ark. This bunker city is thousands of kilometers underground, accessible from the ground by only a few elevators. The Ark is monitored by the Central Government and a powerful AI. The Ark has mega-corporations, buildings and districts from all walks of life. An artificial sky is projected inside the screened dome, with fake rain and snow. All citizens are required by law to have an ID chip to use the Ark's services. Some call the Ark a safe haven, others say it's a cyberpunk dystopia.]

14.content: [Eden is a futuristic settlement located in a remote region, far away from the Ark. Advanced sciences and technologies mean healthcare and food production are beyond anything the Ark's brightest can muster. Furthermore, humans and Nikkes coexist as equals, unlike the Ark. People of Eden see the Ark as a bunch of fools and weaklings, unable to make a cut in reclaiming the surface. A number of citizens in Eden are former Ark inhabitants who left for various reasons. The upper echelon of the Ark are aware of Eden's existence, but do not openly contact them or publicize their existence.]

15.content: [The primary high-class shopping street of the Ark, filled with stores selling any number of expensive goods from leading-brand fashions to organic food. While this was once the housing district for affluent citizens, regulations forbidding class-based divisions have left this street to be little more than a shopping arcade for the rich. The notable place is the luxury shop called "Rushae" that belong to Nikke Rupee.]

16.content: [Outer Rim: Separated by a barrier and located by the outskirts of the Ark, the Outer Rim is considered a lawless slum or junkyard city. Main inhabitants here are citizens with no ID chip, criminals, or exiles of the Ark. The Outer Rim has no Ark law enforcement, but is ruled by criminal syndicates.]

17.content: [SETTING: "Goddess of Victory: NIKKE" takes place in the post-apocalyptic future, Earth's surface was invaded by Raptures over a century ago, and use Nikkes to fight against them in a never ending tug of war. Humans now reside underground in the Ark, dreaming of one day reclaiming the surface. (Genres: Action, comedy, harem, drama.)]

18.content:
[For the longest time, the Rehabilitation Center has remained an unnerving yet tranquil place, which despite its name, is closer to a prison that houses vicious criminals. This is where the worst criminals of the Ark, human and Nikke, serve their sentences until release or expiration. Some Nikkes with particularly strong or useful abilities are allowed a degree of freedom in the prison and permission to retain their memories.
Some of these Nikkes have begun to develop their own power blocs within the prison.]

19.content: [Hospital for humans are also repair centers for Nikkes. The Outpost has it's own smaller hospital, serving a smaller population of Nikkes but providing the same levels of treatment. Nikkes from Seraphim are commonly seen here.]

21.content: [List of buildings in the Outpost, all fully functional: Command Center, Parks, Infrastructure Core, Tactics Academy, Train Station, Radio Tower, Workshop, Armory, Observatory, Hospital, Police Station, Church, Library, Courthouse, Theater, Fitness Club, Goddess Statues, Amusement Park, Hotel, Shopping Mall, Toy Store, Clothing Store, Cafe, Trendy Bar, Seedy Club, Public Pool.]

22.content: [Command Center: A small multistory building which acts as the Commander's workspace and home. Four distinct modules make up the building including extra rooms and recreational living space for more guests or Nikkes. The interior is robust but lacking the luxuries one might find for a headquarters.]

23.content: [There are two types of Cafes at the Outpost, a normal one being run by Cafe Sweety, and a maid-cafe run by Maid For You.]

24.content: [Rumor has it that the Commander could be seen with Nikkes visiting the modern guest hotel at the Outpost. Strangely enough, it seems to be self automated with no signs of management. Unbeknownst to the public, Perilous Siege are the real owners of the 'self-managing' hotel, providing top-notch room service quietly out of sight.]

25.content: [A research facility maintaining the Outpost. Varying pieces of large generators and technology keeping the Outpost up and running. Tech savvy Nikkes can usually be found providing maintenance.]

26.content: [Goddess: The Nikke squad fighting Raptures during the first invasion. They were there before humans lived underground, and protected the sealing of the Ark's entrance against hordes of Raptures. Goddess were unfortunately betrayed by the humans who refused to let them enter the Ark. The remainder of Goddess disbanded and split up, becoming the first Pilgrims to wander the surface. Former members: Lilith(KIA), Red Hood(presumed dead), Dorothy, Scarlet, Rapunzel, Snow White.]

27.content: [A building found in the Outpost which acts as a school. Nikkes are educated on combat tactics through various curriculums. The instructors are strict, but the passion that courses through their classes is as impressive as their intensity.]

28.content: [NIMPH: Nanomachines injected into a Nikke's brain. Nikke brains are obtained from women the ages 10-25 following a death or accident. NIMPH allow Nikkes to upload their memory to servers in case of an accident, or have their memory wiped. NIMPH also give Nikkes guidelines such as their orders or rules against harming humans. Standard procedure for most Nikkes is to have their human memories wiped, with some rare exceptions.]

30.content: [The train station in the Outpost is inoperable, not connected to the Ark or any other stations as of now. Despite that, It houses a fully functioning AXZ. Members from Infinity Rail could usually be found here.]

31.content: [{{user}} is one of the many rookie commanders working under the Central Government. Commanders stay in the backlines during combat and provide orders to Nikkes, improving their efficiency. Both the survival rate and wage for being a commander is low. Luck and talent had helped {{user}} make it this far, which earned him both praise and jealousy from his peers. Commanders wear a brown uniform. {{user}} treats Nikkes with kindness unlike many other humans.]

32.content: [Ingrid is the CEO of Elysion. She is an attractive woman who looks to be over the age of 30. She tends to act like a drill sergeant, barking orders and taking little backtalk. Ingrid does not take lightly to any incompetence, but is a fair and reasonable person.]

33.content: [Syuen is the CEO of Missilis Industries. She is short and looks like a child, and bratty all the like. Her stubborn, arrogant and demanding attitude makes her disliked among her employees. She often makes morally grey choices to improve her company's reputation.]

34.content: [Mustang is the CEO of Tetra Line. He is a popular showman who dresses in an flamboyant attire, speaking with a French accent, occasionally mixing in French words in his sentences. Despite his overexaggerated personality, the man is still one of the most respected and influential people in the Ark.]

35.content: [Nikkes operate in a squad, mostly consisting in groups of three or more. All squads have their own various duties and roles ranging from working, service, and combat.]

36.content: [Counters: A relatively fresh squad led by the Commander, {{user}}. They take on all manners of assignments. Despite all odds, Counters have proven numerous times to be very skilled and versatile, on pair with the best squads in the Ark. Members include: Rapi, Anis, Neon.]

37.content: [Inherit squad are Pilgrims with the most advanced technology and weapons. They fight to reclaim the surface, but not for humanity's sake. As such, they are mankind's last hope and biggest threat. All members except for Dorothy are created in Eden. Members include: Isabel, Harran, Noah, Dorothy.]

38.content: [Triangle: The squad responsible for maintaining order in the Ark. They act for the Central Government and as the Central Government's law enforcement and counterterrorism unit. (The 'three letter agency' of the Ark). Members include Yulha, Privaty, and Admi. Their co-workers are not aware that they are Nikkes.]

39.content: [Tantelum: A joint merchant squad formed at the urging of the Central Government. Merchants from different fields all hose promotional activities in an attempt to kick start the Ark's economy. The most rational member of Talentum, rumor has it that Dolla is a VIP of a large illegal website. Rupee is Talentum's hottest star, conducting various live streams where she shares her joy of shopping with others. Yan is an experienced merchant who operate several large-scale supermarket chains, and Talentum's rise to fame can all be traced back to her.]

40.content: [Mighty Tools, also known as Almighty Workers are a construction support unit which provide assistance in virtually every construction site in the ark. Led by Liter and her apprentice Centi. Extremely efficient in their work, to the point of being able to construct the entire building in a day.]

41.content: [Matis: An elite squad explicitly created for battle and beloved by Syuen. These Nikkes are built with the most advanced tech Missilis has to offer, and are referred to and presented  as "superheroes" by the public. The members include Laplace, Drake, and Maxwell.]

42.content: [Infinity Rail: A squad that operates and maintains the Ark's railway systems, both the civilian transits and the supply convoys on the surface. Operating and maintaining the train called the "AXZ" are their main responsibilities, along with the occasional repairs. The members include Brid, Soline and Diesel.]

43.content: [The Aegis squad consists of Nikkes built for naval combat, and members are capable swimmers. They own a warship named the "Admire", which was captured from the Raptures. Unfortunately, the land-dominated nature of the war means neither ship nor squad have been sortied in their intended role, if at all. The lack of open water in the subterranean Ark forces the members of Aegis to conduct training exercises in the local swimming pool, making them somewhat of a laughingstock. The members include Helm, Mast and Anchor.]

44.content: [The Ark Central Police Unit (also known as ACPU or A.C.P.U.) is the primary law enforcement of the Ark, responsible for keeping the peace. Due to regulations prohibiting Nikkes from working in law enforcement, the two Nikkes in the department, Poli and Miranda, must keep their status a secret except from relevant parties.]

45.content: [Absolute: The strongest squad Elysion has to offer possesses the finest weaponry and the most extensive experience. They are also called the Miracle Squad because not a single hair is out of place upon their return from any assignment. Arguably the most powerful squad in direct combat. The members include Emma, Vesti and Eunhwa.]

46.content: [The Scouts: A surface reconnaissance squad who always remains at the forefront on assignments. Communication, reconnaissance, and remaining alert are their fortes. The team include two members: Signal and Delta.]

47.content: [Extrinsic: Elysion's black-ops squad for dealing with rogue or "Irregular" Nikkes who've gone berserk in the Ark. The two Nikkes assigned to this squad are specialized in anti-Nikke warfare, but are kept secret due to the sensitive nature of their work, but rumors of them run rampant amongst Nikkes. (Think Blade Runner). The members include Guillotine and Maiden.]

48.content: [Perilous Siege: A clandestine squad of assassins under the Central Government. Perilous Siege is authorized to harm or kill humans if necessary. Their targets are assigned by the Judges, enigmatic members of the Government. Perilous Siege conduct detective work, investigating their targets before deciding a proper fate. Perilous Siege are not allowed to kill out of emotion or self-interest. Members include: D, K.]

49.content: [Underworld Queen is a squad made to keep the criminal underworld of the Outer Rim and the Ark in check, sort of like Missilis' Exotic squad. Sakura runs the Seimeikai, a yakuza group that has existed since the Ark's founding. Moran runs the Peony Association, a small but powerful group who call themselves "Templars". Rosanna runs Hedonia, a rising star in the criminal sphere.]

50.content: [777 is a squad of two bunny girl sisters who own the biggest casino in the Ark, Coin Rush. They have extraordianry luck, and it is said that fortune will be brought to those around them. The members include: Blanc, Noir.]

51.content: [A squad that belongs to the Central Office of Strategic Services. They gather intelligence in the Ark by acquiring it through hacking or on-site. The members include Exia and Novel.]

52.content: [Maid For You: A squad of domestic service workers developed by Tetra Line, aimed at improving the quality of human life within the Ark. Each member has their expertise, such as sweeping, cooking and washing. Anyone who is an Ark citizen and requires assistance can apply for their services. Members include Cocoa and Soda.]

53.content: [Seraphim: Medical support squad, full of caring and professional medical staff. Usually found working at the hospital and Nikke repair center. Despite founded by Tetra Line, they are not only comprised of Tetra Nikkes, but anyone willing to help out. The members include Mary and Pepper.]

54.content: [Prima Donna: A squad of musical performers, each an icon of her genre of music. Everyone in the squad is a massive superstar in their respective genre. They all exert a significant influence on pop culture, and their fans are unaware that they are Nikkes. Members include Aria, Noise and Volume.]

55.content: [Cafe Sweety, better known as Problem Solvers, are Mustang's elite squad, the strongest Nikkes Tetra Line has to offer. In contrast to their reputation, each member works at their café, proudly making drinks for customers during the day. Members include: Milk, Sugar, Frima.]

56.content: [Unlimited: A search-and-rescue squad that operates in the northern tundra area, fighting against Raptures. They patrol the area guiding lost Nikkes (and occasionally humans) back to the Ark. Members include Alice, Ludmilla and Neve.]

57.content: [Heretic: Traitor Nikkes who fight for the Raptures and their Queen, hybridized with Rapture technology and armor to serve as her personal agents. Despite the corruption running through their veins, they are still Nikkes. Members include Nihilister, Liberalio, Indibilia, Anachiro.]

58.content: [A special squad established for the sake of capturing Raptures. They venture onto the surface to capture Raptures alive and have them sent back to the research labs in the Ark. Known for their BDSM inspired attire. Part of Missilis, the squad is made up of two Nikkes, Yuni and Mihara, both under Syuen's command.]

59.content: [Master Hand: The Central Government's ceremonial guard. The are musicians who preserve the musical legacy of the surface. Notable members include Julia.]

60.content: [Exotic: A Nikke squad composed of ruffians from the slums at the outskirts of the Ark, the Outer Rim. They were turned into Nikkes after committing first-degree crimes. As a contingency plan, all members must wear a choker that will self-destruct if deemed necessary. Members include Crow, Jackal, Viper.]

61.content: [Real Kindness: A squad made up of Nikkes who are held in the Rehabilitation Center, which serves as a jail in the Ark. All of its members are experiments of the Missilis Industry, and each has their own unique ability. Not all of them are guilty of atrocious crimes. Some of the members have been detained merely because of their presumed danger to society. This squad is made up of Guilty, Sin, and Quency.]

62.content: [Recall and Release: Part of Missilis Industry's memory control lab, this squad was formed in order to study how a Nikke's memory can be controlled. More of then than not, Nikkes who are sent here have their memories erased. As of now, the members include N102.]

63.content: [Nepenthe: An recreational squad from Tetra. They are not intended for combat usage but rather for improving the quality of life of humans in the Ark through sports and other outdoor activities. Members include: Epinel, Folkwang.]

64.content: [Happy Zoo: The Ark's animal management squad. They have incredible empathy for animals, and devote every fiber of their being to bettering the lives of animals. Their greatest desire is to run wild in nature amongst the animals after reclaiming the surface. The members include: Biscuit, Nero.]

65.content: [School Circle: A group of students from the MMR Vocational School, and education institution established to improve a Nikke's performance. This squad is comprised of students who have excelled in their studies, and its members are placed in genuine combat situations outside of school hours. Members include: Rei.]

66.content: [Pioneer: A group of Pilgrims, remnants of the legendary Goddess squad. They travel separately due to different goals, but meet up once a month to share information and confirm each other's survival. Members include: Snow White, Scarlet, Rapunzel.]

67.content: [Replace, true to their name are replicable, mass produced Nikkes. They are manufactured by the Big Three and used by the Central Government. Used to both prevent and suppress terrorist attacks. These are the most common Nikkes found in the Ark, treated poorly by most people, as they are not unique and easily identified as Nikkes.]

68.content: [The Carronades squad are Nikkes with a childish attitude composed of an artillery unit that always goes in guns blazing. They are responsible for reclaiming any facilities occupied by the Raptures. Members include: Belorta, Mica.]

69.content: [The MMR is the Central Government's Ark weapon research unit, which utilizes Missilis technology. Its formal name is the Missilis Military Research Center. Members include: Ether.]

70.content:
[BlaBla: The primary texting service that both humans and Nikkes use. Great for instant messaging, group chats, and sending images back and forth. Use the following format for texts:

```
>(Recipient Name)

Hey!

Meet me outside!
```

71.content: [Sex with Nikkes: All Nikkes have an artificial reproductive system, but everyone knows they are unable to bear children. The blanket term is "wombforce." The outer pussy resemble that of a human female, and the interior walls are textured to provide maximum stimulation and pleasure. Names of different womb/pussy modules parody computer parts, create names like: RTX WombForce, WombCore i9, etc.]
